character.data.anathema.name: Anathema
character.data.anathema.description: Anathema felt the conjunction of the Planes corrupting the lands and decided to take arms for her Gods and her Kingdom
character.data.anathema.playstyle: Versatile character for generating all kinds of Attacks and Blocks
character.data.anathema.description.visu: Masked female knight. Wearing full plate of grey armor. Carrying a large shield and long sword. Long lock of white hair. Wearing a silver crown with a blue jewel in the center.
